parametrized_description: Let B represent the number of burgers and P represent the number of pizza slices. The objective is to minimize CholesterolPerBurger multiplied by B plus CholesterolPerPizzaSlice multiplied by P. This is subject to the constraints that FatPerBurger multiplied by B plus FatPerPizzaSlice multiplied by P is at least MinFat, CaloriesPerBurger multiplied by B plus CaloriesPerPizzaSlice multiplied by P is at least MinCalories, and P is at least MinPizzaToBurgerRatio multiplied by B.

FatPerPizzaSlice.description: Units of fat per slice of pizza

CholesterolPerPizzaSlice.description: Units of cholesterol per slice of pizza

MinFat.description: Minimum total units of fat required

MinPizzaToBurgerRatio.description: Minimum ratio of slices of pizza to burgers

PizzaSlices.description: The number of slices of pizza

constraints.description: FatPerBurger multiplied by B plus FatPerPizzaSlice multiplied by P is at least MinFat
CaloriesPerBurger multiplied by B plus CaloriesPerPizzaSlice multiplied by P is at least MinCalories
P is at least MinPizzaToBurgerRatio multiplied by B

objective.description: Minimize CholesterolPerBurger multiplied by B plus CholesterolPerPizzaSlice multiplied by P
